title.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, Nov. 18, 1932. From Among Our Circles

div.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, Nov. 18, 1932. FROM AMONG OUR CIRCLES

body.p: The Young Men's Club at Saint Michael's parish is making preparations for its annual performance presented at Christmas time for the benefit of the poor in Saint Michael's parish.

The members of the club are endeavoring to show their appreciation to their benefactors who support their performance by staging an extraordinary play. Through their efforts the club brings joy and happiness to the less fortunate of their group.
